name: Bluns
description: Hi! This is my very first game jam, and it was super fun! Although the game is a little buggy and doesn't have sound, I'm proud of it. I present to you: BLUNS, a game about blocks with guns(hence the title). In this top down shooter mixed with a bit of puzzle, you are a block who must kill other blocks and circle. Controls are WASD to move, escape to pause, and... nothing else. Hope you enjoy!
